title: Bloomberg Markets: CFRA's Amobi Discusses Media Earnings

description:
Bloomberg Markets with Carol Massar and Cory Johnson. GUEST: Tuna Amobi Media and Entertainment Analyst CFRA Discussing media earnings outlook, including CBS and Viacom.
